column4: well.. Its not a choice really, since the new version is junk. Its like Vista all over. We have to downgrade to get some work done. Embareassing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
im use to windows forcing things on us but never thought ubuntu would.  we dont get a choice then whats the point of open source?
Sad but true!!! I hope Cannonical will wake up and stop trying so hard to become a Mac!
